mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where follower_id = #{users_id}
select count(*) from lookbook where users_no=#{users_no}

select users_id,users_nickname,users_fname,users_no from(select rownum n,users_id,users_nickname,users_fname,users_no from( select users_id,users_nickname,users_fname,users_no from users where users_id in (select following_id from follow where follower_id = #{users_id}))) where n between #{start} and #{end}

select lookbook_fname,lookbook_write from(select rownum n,lookbook_fname,lookbook_write from (select lookbook_fname,lookbook_write from lookbook l,users u where l.users_no=u.users_no and u.users_no=#{users_no})) where n between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from follow where follower_id=#{follower_id} and following_id=#{following_id}
mapper.delete: delete follow where follower_id=#{follower_id} and following_id=#{following_id}
